pages.text: Very powerfully enchanment.You can get it from killing elder guard by chance.

pages.title: ChannelingEX
pages.text: ChannelingEX allows you to detonate lightning $(3)under visiable sky whatever the weather likes$() , The principle of channeling and channelingex is different , It is said that ChannelingEx uses the power of Zeus while channeling useing that of weather.$(br)  So that two enchanments cannot in one trident , Additionally Riptide cannot combine with channelingex too.
